synopsis.text: Teiken High School embarks on a field trip to the Kansai region of Japan, the birthplace of one of its students, Taison Maeda. As fate would have it, Taison's younger brother, Youkou, has reached out to Taison and his elder brother, Fujio, with news of their father's illness, urging them to return home. This unexpected journey home not only offers Taison a chance to reconnect with his ailing father but also provides an opportunity to confront unresolved feelings towards his former friend, Naoto, and ex-girlfriend, Haruka.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
